"super secret Easter Eggs"

"..you can find these obvious, blatant The Shining references peppered throughout Layers of Fear 2 by playing normally"
“OH, MY!” Is still the funniest thing
Chipsturs! Long time no chat! Your old buddy Aaron from RetroLiberty sending you love! <3

comments_since_last_sample.body: I really love your videos, James! I've always been into the concept of developers hiding Easter egg type things in their games. The first time I ever heard of a super secret thing hidden somewhere that doesn't impact the story or storyline was in a Pixar movie. I don't remember which one, but I remember always seeing the Toy Story ball and Pizza Planet truck everywhere. Anyways, keep up the great work! <3
Chipsturs! Long time no chat! Your old buddy Aaron from RetroLiberty sending you love! <3
